    • Method Detail

      • getAllUsers

        public play.mvc.Result getAllUsers()
        Gets all the users from the Database Called when the '/' route receives a GET.
        Returns:

      • profile

        public play.mvc.Result profile​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        An action that renders the profile HTML page with the money displayed in the navbar. Also the user itself and his friends are displayed there. Called when the '/user/profile' route receive a GET request.
        Parameters:
        request - Request the session storage.
        Returns:
        OK if there is a user in the session, else redirect to the login page.

      • isLoggedIn

        public boolean isLoggedIn​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        Function that checks if there is currently a user logged in.
        Parameters:
        request - Request the session storage.
        Returns:
        True if there is a user in the session , false if not.

      • login

        public play.mvc.Result login​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        Login HTML page that shows up when the application is started. Called when the '/' route receives a GET.
        Returns:
        OK if there is NOT a user in the session, else redirect to the mail page.

      • checkLogin

        public play.mvc.Result checkLogin​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        Function that is called when a user wants to log in. Authenticate if the user exist in the database. Get the points and the id of the user. Called when the 'user/auth' route received a POST request.
        Parameters:
        request - Username and password from the JS as JSON Data.
        Returns:
        Status 200 if the user exist, safe user with key "connected", the id and his points in the session. Else username or password are incorrect.

      • createAccount

        public play.mvc.Result createAccount​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        An action that renders the createAccount HTML page. Called when the /user/createAccount route receives a GET request.
        Returns:
        OK if there is NOT a user in the session, else redirect to the mail page.

      • checkCreateAccount

        public play.mvc.Result checkCreateAccount​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        Function is called when a new user registers. Checks the input fields which are fetched to the server from the JS as JSON. If any field is empty, throw an error message. Then check if the passwords are equal and the email contains an @. Create user with username, email and password if everything is correct. Called when the '/user/checkCreateAccount' route receives a POST request.
        Parameters:
        request - JSON Data which contains email, username and password.
        Returns:
        If everything is fine, redirect to login page. Else throw error messages.

      • logout

        public play.mvc.Result logout()
        Logout function. Called when the logout button is pressed and triggers the '/logout' rout as GET request.
        Returns:
        redirect to login page

      • updateProfilePic

        public play.mvc.Result updateProfilePic​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        Function that updates the profile picture of the current user. Get the img as JSON and update the picture in the database. Called when the '/user/updatePic' route receives a POST request.
        Parameters:
        request - Request picture from JS as JSON.
        Returns:
        OK

      • updateName

        public play.mvc.Result updateName​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        Function that updates the username of the current user. Get the inputfield as JSON, checks if the name exist already in the database. Called when the 'user/updateName' route receives a POST request. If not, update it, else throw error.
        Parameters:
        request - Inputfield from the JS as JSON.
        Returns:
        Redirect to the profile page or error message.
